puerto.title: Puerto Agua Verde
puerto.text: Puerto Agua Verde is a small corner of Baja California Sur known for its turquoise waters, community atmosphere, and untouched nature. Here, traditional fishing, quiet beaches, and outdoor activities combine to attract travelers in search of authenticity and peace.

rancho.title: Rancho San Cosme
rancho.text: Rancho San Cosme is a historical and cultural space where rural life remains alive. Surrounded by mountains and desert vegetation, it is a meeting point for visitors seeking local experiences, trails, guided activities, and connection with nature.
